Aerial Attack

An immersive VR multiplayer experience where players defend against waves of enemy helicopters made for VRChat

  • A variety of explosive weapons to take down AI helicopters
  • A mutiplayer experience synchronized seamlessly among up to 16 players
  • Compatible with both VR and desktop platforms
  • Players also face the unexpected challange of battling each other


Launch the world from vrchat.com/home/launch?worldId=wrld_e1a304db-bca2-4364-ba46-82f83990fbe7
